amendment.description: Amendment, as modified, increases funding for the Housing Opportunities for Persons with AIDS program from $260 million to $275 million for FY 2001.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in House Report 106-562 to increase the funding authorization for the Housing Opportunities for Persons with AIDS (HOPWA) program from $260 million to $292 million for FY 2001.

action.text: Shays amendment (A008) modified by unanimous consent. The modification changes the dollar figure proposed to be inserted from $292 million to $275 million.
On agreeing to the Shays amendment (A008) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
